text: Joachim Sauer (born 19 April 1949) is a German professor of physical and theoretical chemistry. He was born in Hosena, Brandenburg. Sauer has two sons by his first wife. He married Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel on 30 December 1998. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2009. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:East German people Category:German academics Category:German chemists Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:People from Brandenburg
title: Joachim Sauer
